name: Kill Switch (itch) (ColinChar)
description: Kill Switch is a first person platformer shooter. The player has to traverse over randomly generating platforms while defending themselves from drones that are invisible to the naked eye. Using you're ion laser rifle and augmented reality switch headset attempt to achieve the highest score. Players must be cautious because when they activate their augmented reality headset to see the drones they can no longer perceive the real world.
